hints.content:
Find $14$ on the scale of the graph.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Minutes to Walk to School and the vertical axis labeled Student. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, and 42. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Ed, Carol, Bianca, Emma, and Matt. The bar line for each student shows the following: Ed’s bar line extends to 21, Carol’s bar line extends to 35, Bianca’s bar line extends to 28, Emma’s bar line extends to 7, and Matt’s bar line extends to 21. A red line is drawn up from 14 across the graph !

hints.content: On the scale, all bars ending above $14$ show times of more than $14$.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Minutes to Walk to School and the vertical axis labeled Student. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, and 42. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Ed, Carol, Bianca, Emma, and Matt. The bar line for each student shows the following: Ed’s bar line extends to 21, Carol’s bar line extends to 35, Bianca’s bar line extends to 28, Emma’s bar line extends to 7, and Matt’s bar line extends to 21. A red line is drawn up from 14 across the graph. Emma’s bar ending to the left of the red line is highlighted. !

hints.content: Ed, Carol, Bianca, and Matt walk more than $14$ minutes to get to school.

question.content:
The school's fitness coach asked students how long it takes them to walk to school.


[[☃ image 1]]

**Which of the following students take more than $14$ minutes to walk to school?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Minutes to Walk to School and the vertical axis labeled Student. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, and 42. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Ed, Carol, Bianca, Emma, and Matt. The bar line for each student shows the following: Ed’s bar line extends to 21, Carol’s bar line extends to 35, Bianca’s bar line extends to 28, Emma’s bar line extends to 7, and Matt’s bar line extends to 21. !
